content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello, Maryam. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I'm a student, so I have a limited budget. I was wondering if you could offer me a special discount for students?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but I don't offer discounts for students. The rental price for my apartment is non-negotiable. It's already very competitively priced for the location and quality. Would you be willing to pay the full price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Could you please tell me what the full price is?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: The full price for the apartment is 1,200 Euro per month. This includes all utilities and amenities. It's a very reasonable price considering the prime location and the brand new construction. Would you be willing to pay this amount?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is quite expensive for me. I was hoping for something more in the range of 700 Euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 700 Euros is far below my asking price. The apartment is in high demand due to its central location and modern amenities. I'm confident that it's worth the full 1,200 Euros. Would you be willing to pay a little closer to the asking price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, but as a student, it's difficult for me to afford that. I was hoping for something more in the range of 800 Euros per month. This would be more manageable for me.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your situation as a student, but 800 Euros is still below my asking price. The apartment is brand new and in a very desirable area. It's a fantastic opportunity for someone looking for a comfortable and convenient place to live. Would you be willing to pay a bit more?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, but 800 Euros is my maximum budget. I really like the apartment, but I cannot afford more than that.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry to hear that. While 800 Euros is a generous offer, it is not sufficient for the value of the apartment. I believe in providing fair prices for my tenants, but I must also ensure that I am not undervaluing my property. Would you be willing to reconsider your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, but as a student, I cannot afford more than 800 Euros. I am willing to pay that amount for the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your willingness to pay 800 Euros, but I must stick to my price of 1,200 Euros. The apartment is a great investment for a student, as it offers easy access to public transportation and essential amenities. While I value your interest, I cannot accept your offer. If you are unable to pay the full price, I'm afraid we cannot proceed with the rental.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I understand, but I am unable to pay more than 800 Euros. I am sorry for any inconvenience.

I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the rental price is not within my budget.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your situation, and I'm sorry to hear that the price is not within your budget. If you are unable to pay 1,200 Euros, then I cannot offer the apartment to you. Please let me know if you have any other questions or if there is anything else I can assist you with.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
